long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps you to view and compare product prices. You can view all product variants in the same information sheet, compare information, and translate product information from Chinese to English. You can select and add multiple products to the cart simultaneously instead of just choosing one as the default. The application helps you check the website's sellers' reputation, helping you make more informed purchasing decisions.
